bug.author: nan-wang
bug.summary: the training function is missing in the Faiss Indexer
bug.description:
Describe the bug the index object initialized by faiss.index_factory() should be trained before loading the indexed data. Describe how you solve it
implement the train() function for FaissIndexer
<denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
Environment Screenshots

comments.comment: note that this is not unnecessarily true. as not all indexer in faiss need to be pretrained.
